div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1068 Kerch' (anc. Panticapaeum), Crimea oblast, Ukraine, 1869 Burial: c. 300-275 B.C. Contents: c. 200 AE. Pot hoard from fortress Panticapaeum: AE (as BMC 21-22, 23) Disposition: dispersed â€ Liutsenko, p. 14 Prushevskaia, TONGE 1945, p. 23 Possibly from the same hd. as nos. 1069 and 1105 below
